title: Interstices
oneline: A live-performance incorporating self-regulating systems to explore the interstices of an ostensibly solid sound-space continuum.
bio: Volker BÃ¶hm is a musician, sound designer, software developer and composer living in Basel, Switzerland. He is a lecturer in Electronic Music and co-head of the Elektronisches Studio Basel (ESB). In addition to his teaching activities he realizes art, music and media projects in the fields of new music, theatre, (sound) installation and electroacoustic improvisation.
